別宮: (べつぐう) - associated shrine (i.e. auxiliary shrine, subordinate shrine, etc.)
別封: (べっぷう) - under separate cover; accompanying letter
別居期間: (べっきょきかん) - period of separation; time living apart
別居結婚: (べっきょけっこん) - (yoji) commuter marriage
別巻: (べっかん) - separate volume; extra issue
別席: (べっせき) - different seat/special seat/separate room; {sumo} temporary rank after merging of two separate rankings in 1930s
別当: (べっとう) - groom/footman/stableman/equerry; steward/intendant; head of an institution, edp. religious/head of one institution serving also as the head of another
別形: (べっけい) - another form (of a character)
別意: (べつい) - different opinion/different thought/another intention; regret at parting/sadness of parting
別料金: (べつりょうきん) - extra cost; extra charge
別時: (べつじ) - another time; time of separation
別時念仏: (べつじねんぶつ) - recitation of Amida Buddha's name on a specified day and time period (practice of Pure Land Buddhists)
別条: (べつじょう) - (usu. in the negative: 別状なく, 別状がない, etc.) something unusual; something wrong; mishap; accident; serious condition (e.g. after an injury); different situation
別杯: (べっぱい) - farewell cup; farewell dinner
別枠: (betsuwaku) - adicional, extraordinário, fora das normas, caso especial
別格官幣社: (べっかくかんぺいしゃ) - Imperial Shrine of Special Status (receiving some support from the Imperial Household Department)
別業: (べつぎょう) - villa; another line of work
別次元: (べつじげん) - another dimension; different level; whole other level
別段: (べちだん) - particular/special; (usu. before a verb in negative form) (not) particularly/(not) especially
別殿: (べつでん) - palace annex; shrine annex
別派: (べっぱ) - different sect; different party; different school
別添: (べってん) - attachment; annexation; addendum; appendix
別火: (べつび) - cooking over a second fire to prevent contamination from one's everyday fire for performing Shinto rites; cooking over a second fire to prevent contamination from mourning people, menstruating women, etc.
別無く: (べつなく) - (often as ...の別なく) irrespective (e.g. of age); without discrimination; without distinction
別物: (べつもの) - another thing; exception; special case
別状: (べつじょう) - (usu. in the negative: 別状なく, 別状がない, etc.) something unusual; something wrong; mishap; accident; serious condition (e.g. after an injury); different situation
別盃: (べっぱい) - farewell cup; farewell dinner
別称: (べっしょう) - alias; pseudonym; pen name; nom de plume
別種: (べっしゅ) - another kind; distinct species; variety
別立て: (べつだて) - separate dealings or charges
別納: (べつのう) - separate payment; separate delivery
別紙: (べっし) - enclosure; annex; separate sheet; accompanying sheet
別腹: (べつばら) - dessert stomach; having room for dessert despite being full
別荘: (bessou) - casa de férias, casa de veraneio, villa; prisão, cadeia
別荘地: (べっそうち) - area of holiday homes; area of villas
別荘地造り: (べっそうちずくり) - developing a villa site
別荘番: (べっそうばん) - caretaker of a villa
別行動: (べつこうどう) - (ant: 団体行動) doing something separately (from the group); going off on one's own
別言すれば: (べつげんすれば) - in other words
別記: (べっき) - addendum; supplementary material; afterword; postscript; marginal notes
別訳: (べつやく) - variation; different version; another version
別送: (べっそう) - separate mail; separate shipment
別途積立金: (べっとつみたてきん) - special reserve (fund); contingent reserve
別途費用: (べっとひよう) - separate cost; separate fee
別除権: (べつじょけん) - right of exclusion
別項: (べっこう) - special heading; separate paragraph
利かせる: (きかせる) - to season (with salt, etc.)/to bring out taste; to use/to exercise/to display
利かん坊: (きかんぼう) - naughty child; unruly child
利き: (きき) - (効き often refers to medicine) effectiveness/efficacy/efficaciousness; (利き only) dominance (e.g. of left or right hand); (利き only)  tasting (alcohol, tea, etc.)
利き所: (ききどころ) - effective or important point
利き茶: (ききちゃ) - tea tasting/tea-tasting; tea-tasting contest
利き酒: (ききざけ) - sake tasting; wine tasting
利く: (きく) - to be effective/to show effect; to do its work/to carry out its function well; to be possible to use
利し: (とし) - (adj-ku)   (esp. 利し, 鋭し) sharp; (esp. 疾し, 鋭し) intense/strong/powerful; (esp. 疾し, 捷し) quick/rapid/fast; (esp. 敏し, 聆し) keen/sharp/clever
利する: (りする) - to profit/to benefit from; to take advantage of/to make good use of
